description.text: Just dropped a new extension: Hardware Monitor!
It's super easy to keep tabs on your computer's CPU, GPU, and Memory usage, all from your LynxHub status bar. Plus, you can tweak it however you like.
Quick note: This one needs the .NET 8 runtime, and if some numbers aren't popping up, try running LynxHub as an administrator.
Currently, it's just for Windows, but Linux support is coming soon!
I hope you enjoy LynxHub v3's new features! Thanks for staying with the app. I hope it keeps being useful to you.
From Version 3, LynxHub will collect anonymous error reports. This helps me fix critical bugs and make the app better for you.
You can turn this on or off anytime in the Settings.
